statements: SELECT * FROM sale_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, order_details FROM sale_transactions;
SELECT * FROM sale_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM sale_transactions WHERE shipping_status = 'delivered';
SELECT transaction_id, order_details, payment_info FROM sale_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, order_details, payment_info, shipping_status FROM sale_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM sale_transactions WHERE shipping_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, order_details FROM sale_transactions WHERE payment_info->>'payment_method' = 'Credit Card' AND shipping_status IN ('Pending', 'Shipped');
SELECT * FROM sale_transactions WHERE CAST(order_details AS VARCHAR) LIKE '%product%' AND shipping_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(length(order_details)) AS avg_order_length FROM sale_transactions;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT payment_method, amount_paid FROM Payments WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, amount_paid FROM Orders JOIN Payments ON Orders.order_id = Payments.order_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, status FROM shipping_status WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, p.payment_amount FROM orders o INNER JOIN payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, s.status FROM orders o LEFT JOIN shipping_status s ON o.order_id = s.order_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, s.status, p.payment_amount FROM orders o JOIN shipping_status s ON o.order_id = s.order_id LEFT JOIN payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT order_id, status, shipment_date FROM shipping_status WHERE status = 'shipped';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, order_details.product_id, order_details.quantity, order_details.price FROM orders INNER JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY amount ASC, payment_date DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, payments.payment_date, shipping_status.status FROM orders LEFT JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id LEFT JOIN shipping_status ON orders.order_id = shipping_status.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM orders GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE shipping_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT od.order_id, p.product_name, od.quantity, od.price FROM order_details od JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM orders o JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
